block.para: Shows how to use the &Python3long; to create a web application that tracks work items in an &AURlong; database and emails reports by using &SESlong; (&SES;). This example uses a front end built with React.js to interact with a Flask-RESTful Python backend.

listitem.para: Integrate a React.js web application with &AWS-services;.
List, add, and update items in an &AUR; table.
Send an email report of filtered work items by using &SES;.
Deploy and manage example resources with the included &CFNlong; script.

block.para: For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
